docs.snippet: Your daily look at late-breaking news, upcoming events and the stories that will be talked about today:...
docs.lead_paragraph: Your daily look at late-breaking news, upcoming events and the stories that will be talked about today:

docs.snippet: Miami-Dade County lawmakers agreed on Tuesday to commit tax revenues to the Miami Dolphins football team if it can attract big-ticket events like the NFL's Super Bowl and World Cup soccer matches to its privately owned stadium....
docs.lead_paragraph: Miami-Dade County lawmakers agreed on Tuesday to commit tax revenues to the Miami Dolphins football team if it can attract big-ticket events like the NFL's Super Bowl and World Cup soccer matches to its privately owned stadium.

headline.main: County Lawmakers Approve Compromise Deal Over Miami Dolphins Stadium
headline.print_headline: County Lawmakers Approve Compromise Deal Over Miami Dolphins Stadium

docs.snippet: Gordon Beckham and Dayan Viciedo hit two-run home runs, John Danks pitched effectively into the seventh inning and the Chicago White Sox snapped a four-game losing streak with an 8-2 victory over the San Francisco Giants on Tuesday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Gordon Beckham and Dayan Viciedo hit two-run home runs, John Danks pitched effectively into the seventh inning and the Chicago White Sox snapped a four-game losing streak with an 8-2 victory over the San Francisco Giants on Tuesday night.

headline.main: Beckham, Viciedo Power White Sox Past Giants 8-2
headline.print_headline: Beckham, Viciedo Power White Sox Past Giants 8-2

docs.snippet: It's been over a decade since the Kansas City Royals were in first place this late in the season, and try as he might, manager Ned Yost couldn't totally downplay the achievement....
docs.lead_paragraph: It's been over a decade since the Kansas City Royals were in first place this late in the season, and try as he might, manager Ned Yost couldn't totally downplay the achievement.

headline.main: Royals Win 9th Straight to Take Over 1st Place
headline.print_headline: Royals Win 9th Straight to Take Over 1st Place

docs.snippet: What do you need to do to get better at something after you have gone through the early stages of making a lot of progress really quickly?...
docs.lead_paragraph: What do you need to do to get better at something after you have gone through the early stages of making a lot of progress really quickly?
docs.abstract: David Brooks Op-Ed column examines complex dynamics of how people achieve excellence in a field or specific skill; notes blog post by Canadian writer Scott H Young asserting that most structures of growth are logarithmic, where initial success comes easily but exponential progress requires thousands of hours of work; argues that key factor is a capacity to switch habits and assumptions in order to attain mastery.

docs.snippet: Frank Lampard is bracing himself for his 36th birthday Friday after the England midfielder saw one of the team's staff members receive his "gift."...
docs.lead_paragraph: Frank Lampard is bracing himself for his 36th birthday Friday after the England midfielder saw one of the team's staff members receive his "gift."

headline.main: BRAZIL BEAT: Lampard Braces for Birthday 'Treat'
headline.print_headline: BRAZIL BEAT: Lampard Braces for Birthday 'Treat'
